about_the_game:
Welcome to "Miami Sunset Drive," where an eternal sunset paints the sky in breathtaking hues as a gentle coastal wind caresses your face. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping variation of the endless runner genre, merging the thrill of racing cars with the charm of Miami's scenic beauty and retro-futuristic vibes.

In this immersive gaming experience, you'll take the wheel of your favorite car and embark on a never-ending adventure through the vibrant streets of Miami. Say goodbye to the traditional notion of jumping over enemies; instead, showcase your expert driving skills by elegantly maneuvering around slower fellow travelers, all while grooving to the captivating beats of a synthwave soundtrack.

Key Features
  • Endless Miami Adventure: Experience an ever-changing, never-ending journey through the picturesque streets of Miami, where the sunsets are eternal, and the excitement knows no bounds.
  • Unique Driving Mechanics: Unlike traditional endless runners, "Miami Sunset Drive" offers an innovative twist by letting players skillfully maneuver their cars around slower travelers, adding a fresh and exhilarating element to the gameplay.
  • Synthwave Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the retro-futuristic atmosphere with a captivating synthwave soundtrack that complements the driving experience, making each moment on the road an electrifying one.
  • Stunning Graphics: Indulge your senses in the beauty of Miami's visuals, brought to life with impressive graphics that capture the essence of the city's vibrant colors and iconic landmarks.
  • Coin Collection and Rewards: Collect coins along your journey to unlock exciting rewards, enhancing your car's performance and personalizing your driving experience, encouraging players to strive for greater achievements.

name: Miami Sunset Drive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Race through Miami's eternal sunset in this endless runner! Drive your favorite car to synthwave beats, collect coins, and dodge slower travelers. How far can you go? Enjoy stunning graphics and an immersive soundtrack in this thrilling never-ending adventure!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
*languages with full audio support
